resources.string: Caffe latte (or simply latte) is a coffee drink made with espresso and steamed milk. The word comes from the Italian caff√® e latte, caffelatte or caffellatte, which means "coffee & milk"

Outside of Italy, cappuccino is a coffee drink that today is typically composed of a single espresso shot and hot milk, with the surface topped with foamed milk. Cappuccinos are most often prepared with an espresso machine.
Filter coffee is not exactly a new style in the wide world of coffee. In fact, in some parts of the globe, filter coffee is far more popular than espresso.
